Requirements You have a foe @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed]

You thrash the grabbed foe around. It takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier plus your weapon specialization damage plus your Rage damage. The foe must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.classDCs.barbarian.dc.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC.
